title: Del Rancho Baleadas
instructions: Step 1. Spread the beans on each tortilla.
Step 3. In a skillet, cook the eggs and season with salt and pepper.
Step 4. Divide the eggs among the four tortillas.
Step 5. Add chicharrones to taste on each tortilla and fold in half.
Step 6. You can heat them in a skillet, then they’re ready to eat.
